+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-matrix"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>matrix</span></h2>
+<p>matrix — Matrix manipulation and calculation</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-matrix.html#g3d-matrix-identity">g3d_matrix_identity</a>             (gfloat *matrix);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-matrix.html#g3d-matrix-multiply">g3d_matrix_multiply</a>             (gfloat *m1,
+                                             gfloat *m2,
+                                             gfloat *rm);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-matrix.html#g3d-matrix-translate">g3d_matrix_translate</a>            (gfloat x,
+                                             gfloat y,
+                                             gfloat z,
+                                             gfloat *rm);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-matrix.html#g3d-matrix-rotate">g3d_matrix_rotate</a>               (gfloat angle,
+                                             gfloat ax,
+                                             gfloat ay,
+                                             gfloat az,
+                                             gfloat *rm);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-matrix.html#g3d-matrix-rotate-xyz">g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz</a>           (gfloat rx,
+                                             gfloat ry,
+                                             gfloat rz,
+                                             gfloat *rm);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2529126"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-matrix-identity"></a>g3d_matrix_identity ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2529138"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_matrix_identity             (gfloat *matrix);</pre>
+<p>
+Sets the given matrix to the identity matrix.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>matrix</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> 4x4 matrix (float[16])
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2529197"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-matrix-multiply"></a>g3d_matrix_multiply ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2529209"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_matrix_multiply             (gfloat *m1,
+                                             gfloat *m2,
+                                             gfloat *rm);</pre>
+<p>
+Multiplies the matrixes.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>m1</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> first matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>m2</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> second matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rm</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> resulting matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2558698"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-matrix-translate"></a>g3d_matrix_translate ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2558709"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_matrix_translate            (gfloat x,
+                                             gfloat y,
+                                             gfloat z,
+                                             gfloat *rm);</pre>
+<p>
+Adds a translation to the the matrix.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>x</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x translation
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>y</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y translation
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>z</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z translation
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rm</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> resulting matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2558832"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-matrix-rotate"></a>g3d_matrix_rotate ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2558844"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_matrix_rotate               (gfloat angle,
+                                             gfloat ax,
+                                             gfloat ay,
+                                             gfloat az,
+                                             gfloat *rm);</pre>
+<p>
+Adds a rotation to the matrix.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>angle</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> rotation angle
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ax</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component of rotation axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ay</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component of rotation axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>az</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component of rotation axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rm</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> resulting matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2548802"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-matrix-rotate-xyz"></a>g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2548813"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz           (gfloat rx,
+                                             gfloat ry,
+                                             gfloat rz,
+                                             gfloat *rm);</pre>
+<p>
+Adds a rotation around the 3 coordinate system axes to the matrix.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rx</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> rotation around x axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ry</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> rotation around y axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rz</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> rotation around z axis
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>rm</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> resulting matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

+<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">

+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>model</span></h2>
+<p>model — Model manipulation functions</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a>*   <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-new">g3d_model_new</a>                   (void);
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a>*   <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-load">g3d_model_load</a>                  (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-check">g3d_model_check</a>                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-center">g3d_model_center</a>                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);
+void        <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-clear">g3d_model_clear</a>                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);
+void        <a href="libg3d-model.html#g3d-model-free">g3d_model_free</a>                  (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2544742"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-new"></a>g3d_model_new ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2544753"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a>*   g3d_model_new                   (void);</pre>
+<p>
+This functions allocates and initializes a new G3DModel.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody><tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> a newly allocated G3DModel
+</td>
+</tr></tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2538074"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-load"></a>g3d_model_load ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2538086"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a>*   g3d_model_load                  (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename);</pre>
+<p>
+Loads a model from a file. The model is checked, centered, resized,
+optimized.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>context</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> a valid context
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>filename</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file name of the model to load
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> the loaded model or NULL in case of an error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2538168"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-check"></a>g3d_model_check ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2538180"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_model_check                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);</pre>
+<p>
+Checks whether a model returned by plugin is valid.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>model</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the model to check
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE on error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520530"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-center"></a>g3d_model_center ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520543"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_model_center                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);</pre>
+<p>
+Translates all object coordinates that the object center is at (0, 0, 0)</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>model</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the model to center
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE on error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520603"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-clear"></a>g3d_model_clear ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520615"></a><pre class="programlisting">void        g3d_model_clear                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);</pre>
+<p>
+Removes all objects from a model.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody><tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>model</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the model to clear
+</td>
+</tr></tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520664"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-model-free"></a>g3d_model_free ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520676"></a><pre class="programlisting">void        g3d_model_free                  (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);</pre>
+<p>
+Frees all memory allocated for the model including all objects, materials
+and textures.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody><tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>model</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the model to free
+</td>
+</tr></tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

@@ -0,0 +1,308 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
+<html>
+<head>
+<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=US-ASCII">
+<title>object</title>
+<meta name="generator" content="DocBook XSL Stylesheets V1.68.1">
+<link rel="start" href="index.html" title="Libg3d Reference Manual">
+<link rel="up" href="ch02.html" title="object interface">
+<link rel="prev" href="libg3d-model.html" title="model">
+<link rel="next" href="libg3d-face.html" title="face">
+<meta name="generator" content="GTK-Doc V1.6 (XML mode)">
+<link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" type="text/css">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch01.html" title="libg3d types and initialization">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch02.html" title="object interface">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch03.html" title="plugin interface">
+</head>
+<body bgcolor="white" text="black" link="#0000FF" vlink="#840084" alink="#0000FF">
+<table class="navigation" id="top" width="100%" summary="Navigation header" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2">
+<tr valign="middle">
+<td><a accesskey="p" href="libg3d-model.html"><img src="left.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Prev"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="u" href="ch02.html"><img src="up.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Up"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="h" href="index.html"><img src="home.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Home"></a></td>
+<th width="100%" align="center">Libg3d Reference Manual</th>
+<td><a accesskey="n" href="libg3d-face.html"><img src="right.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Next"></a></td>
+</tr>
+<tr><td colspan="5" class="shortcuts"><nobr><a href="#top_of_page" class="shortcut">Top</a>
+                   | 
+                  <a href="#desc" class="shortcut">Description</a></nobr></td></tr>
+</table>
+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-object"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>object</span></h2>
+<p>object — Object manipulation</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+void        <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-free">g3d_object_free</a>                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);
+gdouble     <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-radius">g3d_object_radius</a>               (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-scale">g3d_object_scale</a>                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object,
+                                             gfloat scale);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-transform">g3d_object_transform</a>            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object,
+                                             gfloat *matrix);
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-duplicate">g3d_object_duplicate</a>            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-optimize">g3d_object_optimize</a>             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-smooth">g3d_object_smooth</a>               (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-object.html#g3d-object-merge">g3d_object_merge</a>                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *o1,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *o2);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2549637"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-free"></a>g3d_object_free ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2549649"></a><pre class="programlisting">void        g3d_object_free                 (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);</pre>
+<p>
+Frees all memory allocated for that object.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody><tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to free
+</td>
+</tr></tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2549698"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-radius"></a>g3d_object_radius ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2549711"></a><pre class="programlisting">gdouble     g3d_object_radius               (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);</pre>
+<p>
+Calculates the radius of the object. This is the maximum from the
+center to a vertex.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to measure
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> the radius of the given object
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2537058"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-scale"></a>g3d_object_scale ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2537071"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_object_scale                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object,
+                                             gfloat scale);</pre>
+<p>
+Resizes the object by the factor <em class="parameter"><code>scale</code></em>.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to scale
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>scale</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> scale factor
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2537157"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-transform"></a>g3d_object_transform ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2537168"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_object_transform            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object,
+                                             gfloat *matrix);</pre>
+<p>
+Multiplies all vertices of the object with the transformation matrix.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to transform
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>matrix</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the transformation matrix
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2537248"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-duplicate"></a>g3d_object_duplicate ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2537259"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  g3d_object_duplicate            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);</pre>
+<p>
+Duplicates an object with all vertices, faces and materials.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to duplicate
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> the new clone object
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2553365"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-optimize"></a>g3d_object_optimize ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2553377"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_object_optimize             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);</pre>
+<p>
+Puts all vertex and face information into special arrays for faster
+rendering.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to optimize
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2553438"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-smooth"></a>g3d_object_smooth ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2553450"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_object_smooth               (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *object);</pre>
+<p>
+FIXME: unimplemented.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>object</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the object to smooth
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2553509"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-object-merge"></a>g3d_object_merge ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2553522"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_object_merge                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *o1,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a> *o2);</pre>
+<p>
+Merges both objects into <em class="parameter"><code>o1</code></em>.
+FIXME: needs cleanup</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>o1</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> first and target object
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>o2</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> second object
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>plugins</span></h2>
+<p>plugins — Plugin interface</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+#define     <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#G3D-PLUGIN-UNKNOWN:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN</a>
+#define     <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#G3D-PLUGIN-IMPORT:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT</a>
+#define     <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#G3D-PLUGIN-IMAGE:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE</a>
+gpointer    (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginInitFunc">*PluginInitFunc</a>)               (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+void        (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginCleanupFunc">*PluginCleanupFunc</a>)            (gpointer user_data);
+gboolean    (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginLoadModelFunc">*PluginLoadModelFunc</a>)          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model,
+                                             gpointer user_data);
+gboolean    (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginLoadImageFunc">*PluginLoadImageFunc</a>)          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a> *image,
+                                             gpointer user_data);
+gchar*      (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginGetDescFunc">*PluginGetDescFunc</a>)            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+gchar**     (<a href="libg3d-plugins.html#PluginGetExtFunc">*PluginGetExtFunc</a>)             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+            <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#G3DPlugin">G3DPlugin</a>;
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#g3d-plugins-init">g3d_plugins_init</a>                (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+void        <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#g3d-plugins-cleanup">g3d_plugins_cleanup</a>             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#g3d-plugins-load-model">g3d_plugins_load_model</a>          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#g3d-plugins-load-image">g3d_plugins_load_image</a>          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a> *image);
+gchar**     <a href="libg3d-plugins.html#g3d-plugins-get-image-extensions">g3d_plugins_get_image_extensions</a>
+                                            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2536333"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-PLUGIN-UNKNOWN:CAPS"></a>G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2525918"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN   0x00
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2525932"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-PLUGIN-IMPORT:CAPS"></a>G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2525944"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT    0x01
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2525960"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-PLUGIN-IMAGE:CAPS"></a>G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2525971"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE     0x02
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2525987"></a><h3>
+<a name="PluginInitFunc"></a>PluginInitFunc ()</h3>

+<p>

+<col align="left" valign="top">

+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>

+<a name="PluginCleanupFunc"></a>PluginCleanupFunc ()</h3>

+<p>

+<a name="PluginLoadModelFunc"></a>PluginLoadModelFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2526124"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    (*PluginLoadModelFunc)          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model,
+                                             gpointer user_data);</pre>
+<p>

+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>

+<td>

+<td>
+</td>

+<tr>
+<td>

+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2547575"></a><h3>
+<a name="PluginLoadImageFunc"></a>PluginLoadImageFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2547587"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    (*PluginLoadImageFunc)          (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             const gchar *filename,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a> *image,
+                                             gpointer user_data);</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>context</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>filename</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>image</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>user_data</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2547706"></a><h3>
+<a name="PluginGetDescFunc"></a>PluginGetDescFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2547718"></a><pre class="programlisting">gchar*      (*PluginGetDescFunc)            (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context);</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">

+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2563727"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DPlugin"></a>G3DPlugin</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2563738"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	gchar *path;
+	guint32 type;
+	gchar **extensions;
+
+	PluginInitFunc init_func;
+	PluginCleanupFunc cleanup_func;
+	PluginLoadModelFunc loadmodel_func;
+	PluginLoadImageFunc loadimage_func;
+	PluginGetDescFunc desc_func;
+	PluginGetExtFunc ext_func;
+
+	gpointer user_data;
+
+	GModule *module;
+} G3DPlugin;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>

+</table>
+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-primitive"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>primitive</span></h2>
+<p>primitive — 3D primitive generation functions</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  <a href="libg3d-primitive.html#g3d-primitive-cylinder">g3d_primitive_cylinder</a>          (gfloat radius,
+                                             gfloat height,
+                                             guint32 sides,
+                                             gboolean top,
+                                             gboolean bottom,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</a> *material);
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  <a href="libg3d-primitive.html#g3d-primitive-tube">g3d_primitive_tube</a>              (gfloat r_in,
+                                             gfloat r_out,
+                                             gfloat height,
+                                             guint32 sides,
+                                             gboolean top,
+                                             gboolean bottom,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</a> *material);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2565542"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-primitive-cylinder"></a>g3d_primitive_cylinder ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2565553"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  g3d_primitive_cylinder          (gfloat radius,
+                                             gfloat height,
+                                             guint32 sides,
+                                             gboolean top,
+                                             gboolean bottom,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</a> *material);</pre>
+<p>
+Generates an object containing a cylinder.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>radius</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the radius of the cylinder
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>height</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the height of the side faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>sides</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> number of side faces (number of circle segments)
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>top</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> add top faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>bottom</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> add bottom faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>material</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> material to use for faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> cylinder object
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2564458"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-primitive-tube"></a>g3d_primitive_tube ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2564470"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>*  g3d_primitive_tube              (gfloat r_in,
+                                             gfloat r_out,
+                                             gfloat height,
+                                             guint32 sides,
+                                             gboolean top,
+                                             gboolean bottom,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</a> *material);</pre>
+<p>
+Generates an object containing a tube (a cylinder with a hole).</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>r_in</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> inner radius
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>r_out</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> outer radius
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>height</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the height of the side faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>sides</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> number of side faces (number of circle segments)
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>top</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> add top faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>bottom</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> add bottom faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>material</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> material to use for faces
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> tube object
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

@@ -0,0 +1,260 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
+<html>
+<head>
+<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=US-ASCII">
+<title>read</title>
+<meta name="generator" content="DocBook XSL Stylesheets V1.68.1">
+<link rel="start" href="index.html" title="Libg3d Reference Manual">
+<link rel="up" href="ch03.html" title="plugin interface">
+<link rel="prev" href="libg3d-iff.html" title="iff">

+<link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" type="text/css">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch01.html" title="libg3d types and initialization">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch02.html" title="object interface">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch03.html" title="plugin interface">
+</head>
+<body bgcolor="white" text="black" link="#0000FF" vlink="#840084" alink="#0000FF">
+<table class="navigation" id="top" width="100%" summary="Navigation header" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2">
+<tr valign="middle">
+<td><a accesskey="p" href="libg3d-iff.html"><img src="left.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Prev"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="u" href="ch03.html"><img src="up.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Up"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="h" href="index.html"><img src="home.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Home"></a></td>

+<td><a accesskey="n" href="libg3d-matrix.html"><img src="right.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Next"></a></td>
+</tr>
+<tr><td colspan="5" class="shortcuts"><nobr><a href="#top_of_page" class="shortcut">Top</a>
+                   | 
+                  <a href="#desc" class="shortcut">Description</a></nobr></td></tr>
+</table>
+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-read"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>read</span></h2>
+<p>read — Binary file reading helper functions</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+gint32      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-int8">g3d_read_int8</a>                   (FILE *f);
+gint32      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-int16-be">g3d_read_int16_be</a>               (FILE *f);
+gint32      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-int16-le">g3d_read_int16_le</a>               (FILE *f);
+gint32      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-int32-be">g3d_read_int32_be</a>               (FILE *f);
+gint32      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-int32-le">g3d_read_int32_le</a>               (FILE *f);
+gfloat      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-float-be">g3d_read_float_be</a>               (FILE *f);
+gfloat      <a href="libg3d-read.html#g3d-read-float-le">g3d_read_float_le</a>               (FILE *f);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2559997"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-int8"></a>g3d_read_int8 ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2528626"></a><pre class="programlisting">gint32      g3d_read_int8                   (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 1 byte signed integer from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2528684"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-int16-be"></a>g3d_read_int16_be ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2528697"></a><pre class="programlisting">gint32      g3d_read_int16_be               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 2 byte big-endian signed integer from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2528757"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-int16-le"></a>g3d_read_int16_le ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2528770"></a><pre class="programlisting">gint32      g3d_read_int16_le               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 2 byte little-endian signed integer from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2519926"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-int32-be"></a>g3d_read_int32_be ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2519939"></a><pre class="programlisting">gint32      g3d_read_int32_be               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 4 byte big-endian signed integer from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520000"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-int32-le"></a>g3d_read_int32_le ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520012"></a><pre class="programlisting">gint32      g3d_read_int32_le               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 4 byte little-endian signed integer from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520174"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-float-be"></a>g3d_read_float_be ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520186"></a><pre class="programlisting">gfloat      g3d_read_float_be               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 4 byte big-endian floating point number from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2520247"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-read-float-le"></a>g3d_read_float_le ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2520260"></a><pre class="programlisting">gfloat      g3d_read_float_le               (FILE *f);</pre>
+<p>
+Read a 4 byte little-endian floating point number from file.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>f</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file to read from
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

Added: trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/libg3d-texture.html

--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/libg3d-texture.html	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/libg3d-texture.html	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,134 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
+<html>
+<head>
+<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=US-ASCII">
+<title>texture</title>
+<meta name="generator" content="DocBook XSL Stylesheets V1.68.1">
+<link rel="start" href="index.html" title="Libg3d Reference Manual">
+<link rel="up" href="ch02.html" title="object interface">
+<link rel="prev" href="libg3d-material.html" title="material">
+<link rel="next" href="ch03.html" title="plugin interface">
+<meta name="generator" content="GTK-Doc V1.6 (XML mode)">
+<link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" type="text/css">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch01.html" title="libg3d types and initialization">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch02.html" title="object interface">
+<link rel="chapter" href="ch03.html" title="plugin interface">
+</head>
+<body bgcolor="white" text="black" link="#0000FF" vlink="#840084" alink="#0000FF">
+<table class="navigation" id="top" width="100%" summary="Navigation header" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2">
+<tr valign="middle">
+<td><a accesskey="p" href="libg3d-material.html"><img src="left.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Prev"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="u" href="ch02.html"><img src="up.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Up"></a></td>
+<td><a accesskey="h" href="index.html"><img src="home.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Home"></a></td>
+<th width="100%" align="center">Libg3d Reference Manual</th>
+<td><a accesskey="n" href="ch03.html"><img src="right.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Next"></a></td>
+</tr>
+<tr><td colspan="5" class="shortcuts"><nobr><a href="#top_of_page" class="shortcut">Top</a>
+                   | 
+                  <a href="#desc" class="shortcut">Description</a></nobr></td></tr>
+</table>
+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-texture"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>texture</span></h2>
+<p>texture — Texture loading and manipulation</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a>*   <a href="libg3d-texture.html#g3d-texture-load-cached">g3d_texture_load_cached</a>         (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model,
+                                             const gchar *filename);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-texture.html#g3d-texture-prepare">g3d_texture_prepare</a>             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a> *texture);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2525800"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-texture-load-cached"></a>g3d_texture_load_cached ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2525811"></a><pre class="programlisting"><a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a>*   g3d_texture_load_cached         (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a> *context,
+                                             <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a> *model,
+                                             const gchar *filename);</pre>
+<p>
+Loads a texture image from file and attaches it to a hash table in the
+model. On a second try to load this texture it is returned from cache.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>context</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> a valid context
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>model</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> a valid model
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>filename</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> the file name of the texture to load
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> the texture image
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2472206"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-texture-prepare"></a>g3d_texture_prepare ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2472218"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_texture_prepare             (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a> *texture);</pre>
+<p>
+Resizes the image to dimensions which are a power of 2 to be
+usable as an OpenGL texture.
+(FIXME: unimplemented)</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>texture</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> a texture image
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-types"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>types</span></h2>
+<p>types — All types used in libg3d</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+#define     <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3D-FLAG-IMG-GREYSCALE:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE</a>
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DImage">G3DImage</a>;
+#define     <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3D-FLAG-MAT-TWOSIDE:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE</a>
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</a>;
+#define     <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3D-FLAG-FAC-NORMALS:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS</a>
+#define     <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3D-FLAG-FAC-TEXMAP:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP</a>
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DFace">G3DFace</a>;
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DObject">G3DObject</a>;
+gboolean    (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DSetBgColorFunc">*G3DSetBgColorFunc</a>)            (gfloat r,
+                                             gfloat g,
+                                             gfloat b,
+                                             gfloat a,
+                                             gpointer user_data);
+gboolean    (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc">*G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc</a>)       (gpointer user_data);
+gboolean    (<a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc">*G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc</a>)     (gfloat percentage,
+                                             gboolean show,
+                                             gpointer user_data);
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DContext">G3DContext</a>;
+            <a href="libg3d-types.html#G3DModel">G3DModel</a>;
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2494372"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-FLAG-IMG-GREYSCALE:CAPS"></a>G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2494383"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE  (1L << 1)
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2494398"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DImage"></a>G3DImage</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2494410"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	guint32 width;
+	guint32 height;
+	guint8 depth;
+	guint32 flags;
+	guint8 *pixeldata;
+
+	guint32 tex_id;
+	gfloat tex_scale_u;
+	gfloat tex_scale_v;
+} G3DImage;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2494429"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-FLAG-MAT-TWOSIDE:CAPS"></a>G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2494440"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE    (1L << 0)
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2494455"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DMaterial"></a>G3DMaterial</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2494467"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	gfloat r, g, b, a;
+	gfloat shininess;
+	gfloat specular[4];
+	guint32 flags;
+
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+} G3DMaterial;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2494485"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-FLAG-FAC-NORMALS:CAPS"></a>G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2494496"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS    (1L << 0)
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2536351"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3D-FLAG-FAC-TEXMAP:CAPS"></a>G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2536362"></a><pre class="programlisting">#define G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP     (1L << 1)
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2536378"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DFace"></a>G3DFace</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2536390"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	guint32 vertex_count;
+	guint32 *vertex_indices;
+
+	G3DMaterial *material;
+
+	guint32 flags;
+
+	gfloat *normals;
+
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+	guint32 tex_vertex_count;
+	gfloat *tex_vertex_data;
+} G3DFace;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2536409"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DObject"></a>G3DObject</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2536421"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+
+	GSList *materials;
+	GSList *faces;
+	GSList *objects;
+
+	/* don't render this object */
+	gboolean hide;
+
+	/* vertices */
+	guint32 vertex_count;
+	gfloat *vertex_data;
+
+	/* texture stuff: temporary storage, should be in G3DFace items */
+	guint32 tex_vertex_count;
+	gfloat *tex_vertex_data;
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+
+	/* some fields to speed up rendering, should not be used by plugins */
+	/* FIXME: remove from API (replace with user_data pointer?) */
+	gfloat *_normals;
+	G3DMaterial **_materials;
+	guint32  _num_faces;
+	guint32 *_indices;
+	guint32 *_flags;
+	guint32 *_tex_images;
+	gfloat *_tex_coords;
+} G3DObject;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2543918"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DSetBgColorFunc"></a>G3DSetBgColorFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2533043"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    (*G3DSetBgColorFunc)            (gfloat r,
+                                             gfloat g,
+                                             gfloat b,
+                                             gfloat a,
+                                             gpointer user_data);</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>r</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>g</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>b</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>a</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>user_data</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2536559"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc"></a>G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2536570"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    (*G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc)       (gpointer user_data);</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>user_data</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2471852"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc"></a>G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2471863"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    (*G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc)     (gfloat percentage,
+                                             gboolean show,
+                                             gpointer user_data);</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>percentage</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>show</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>user_data</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td>
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td>
+
+
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2471961"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DContext"></a>G3DContext</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2471973"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	GSList *plugins;
+
+	GHashTable *exts_import;
+	GHashTable *exts_image;
+
+	G3DSetBgColorFunc set_bgcolor_func;
+	gpointer set_bgcolor_data;
+	G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc update_interface_func;
+	gpointer update_interface_data;
+	G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc update_progress_bar_func;
+	gpointer update_progress_bar_data;
+} G3DContext;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2471994"></a><h3>
+<a name="G3DModel"></a>G3DModel</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2472006"></a><pre class="programlisting">typedef struct {
+	gchar *filename;
+	G3DContext *context;
+
+	GSList *materials;
+	GSList *objects;
+
+	GHashTable *tex_images;
+} G3DModel;
+</pre>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

+<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN">
+<html>

+<body bgcolor="white" text="black" link="#0000FF" vlink="#840084" alink="#0000FF">
+<table class="navigation" id="top" width="100%" summary="Navigation header" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="2">
+<tr valign="middle">
+<td><a accesskey="p" href="libg3d-matrix.html"><img src="left.png" width="24" height="24" border="0" alt="Prev"></a></td>

+</table>
+<div class="refentry" lang="en">
+<a name="libg3d-vector"></a><div class="titlepage"></div>
+<div class="refnamediv"><table width="100%"><tr>
+<td valign="top">
+<h2><span class="refentrytitle"><a name="top_of_page"></a>vector</span></h2>
+<p>vector — Vector manipulation and calculation</p>
+</td>
+<td valign="top" align="right"></td>
+</tr></table></div>
+<div class="refsynopsisdiv">
+<a name="synopsis"></a><h2>Synopsis</h2>
+<pre class="synopsis">
+
+
+
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-vector.html#g3d-vector-normal">g3d_vector_normal</a>               (gfloat ax,
+                                             gfloat ay,
+                                             gfloat az,
+                                             gfloat bx,
+                                             gfloat by,
+                                             gfloat bz,
+                                             gfloat *nx,
+                                             gfloat *ny,
+                                             gfloat *nz);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-vector.html#g3d-vector-unify">g3d_vector_unify</a>                (gfloat *nx,
+                                             gfloat *ny,
+                                             gfloat *nz);
+gboolean    <a href="libg3d-vector.html#g3d-vector-transform">g3d_vector_transform</a>            (gfloat *x,
+                                             gfloat *y,
+                                             gfloat *z,
+                                             gfloat *matrix);
+</pre>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="desc"></a><h2>Description</h2>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+</div>
+<div class="refsect1" lang="en">
+<a name="details"></a><h2>Details</h2>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2564546"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-vector-normal"></a>g3d_vector_normal ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2564558"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_vector_normal               (gfloat ax,
+                                             gfloat ay,
+                                             gfloat az,
+                                             gfloat bx,
+                                             gfloat by,
+                                             gfloat bz,
+                                             gfloat *nx,
+                                             gfloat *ny,
+                                             gfloat *nz);</pre>
+<p>
+calculate the normal from a plane defined by two vectors</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ax</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component first vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ay</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component first vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>az</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component first vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>bx</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component second vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>by</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component second vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>bz</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component second vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>nx</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component resulting normal
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ny</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component resulting normal
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>nz</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component resulting normal
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2559505"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-vector-unify"></a>g3d_vector_unify ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2559518"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_vector_unify                (gfloat *nx,
+                                             gfloat *ny,
+                                             gfloat *nz);</pre>
+<p>
+Transforms the given vector to the unit vector.</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>nx</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>ny</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>nz</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+<hr>
+<div class="refsect2" lang="en">
+<a name="id2564208"></a><h3>
+<a name="g3d-vector-transform"></a>g3d_vector_transform ()</h3>
+<a class="indexterm" name="id2564219"></a><pre class="programlisting">gboolean    g3d_vector_transform            (gfloat *x,
+                                             gfloat *y,
+                                             gfloat *z,
+                                             gfloat *matrix);</pre>
+<p>
+Transforms the given vector corresponding to the given matrix</p>
+<p>
+
+</p>
+<div class="variablelist"><table border="0">
+<col align="left" valign="top">
+<tbody>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>x</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> x component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>y</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> y component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>z</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> z component of vector
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><em class="parameter"><code>matrix</code></em> :</span></td>
+<td> transformation matrix (4x4)
+</td>
+</tr>
+<tr>
+<td>
+<span class="term"><span class="emphasis"><em>Returns</em></span> :</span></td>
+<td> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</td>
+</tr>
+</tbody>
+</table></div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</div>
+</body>
+</html>

--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/libg3d.devhelp2	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/libg3d.devhelp2	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,101 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "">
+<book xmlns="http://www.devhelp.net/book" title="Libg3d Reference Manual" link="index.html" author="" name="libg3d" version="2">
+  <chapters>
+    <sub name="libg3d types and initialization" link="ch01.html">
+      <sub name="types" link="libg3d-types.html"/>
+      <sub name="context" link="libg3d-context.html"/>
+    </sub>
+    <sub name="object interface" link="ch02.html">
+      <sub name="model" link="libg3d-model.html"/>
+      <sub name="object" link="libg3d-object.html"/>
+      <sub name="face" link="libg3d-face.html"/>
+      <sub name="material" link="libg3d-material.html"/>
+      <sub name="texture" link="libg3d-texture.html"/>
+    </sub>
+    <sub name="plugin interface" link="ch03.html">
+      <sub name="plugins" link="libg3d-plugins.html"/>
+      <sub name="iff" link="libg3d-iff.html"/>
+      <sub name="read" link="libg3d-read.html"/>
+      <sub name="matrix" link="libg3d-matrix.html"/>
+      <sub name="vector" link="libg3d-vector.html"/>
+      <sub name="primitive" link="libg3d-primitive.html"/>
+    </sub>
+  </chapters>
+  <functions>

Added: trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/style.css
===================================================================
--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/style.css	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/html/style.css	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+.synopsis, .classsynopsis 
+{
+  background: #eeeeee;
+  border: solid 1px #aaaaaa;
+  padding: 0.5em;
+}
+.programlisting 
+{
+  background: #eeeeff;
+  border: solid 1px #aaaaff;
+  padding: 0.5em;
+}
+.variablelist 
+{
+  padding: 4px;
+  margin-left: 3em;
+}
+.variablelist td:first-child
+{
+  vertical-align: top;
+}
+div a[name]
+{
+  position: relative;
+  top: -4.5em;
+}
+table.navigation#top
+{
+  background: #ffeeee;
+  border: solid 1px #ffaaaa;
+  margin-top: 0;
+  margin-bottom: 0;
+  position: fixed;
+  top: 0;
+  left: 0;
+  height: 2em;
+  z-index: 1;
+}
+.navigation a 
+{
+  color: #770000;
+}
+.navigation a:visited 
+{
+  color: #550000;
+}
+.navigation .title 
+{
+  font-size: 200%;
+}
+td.shortcuts
+{
+  color: #770000;
+  font-size: 80%;
+}
+
+div.refentry, div.chapter, div.part, div.book, div.index, div.glossary, div.sect1
+{
+  position: relative;
+  top: 3em;
+  z-index: 0;
+}
+div.refnamediv 
+{
+  margin-top: 2em;
+}
+div.gallery-float 
+{
+  float: left;
+  padding: 10px;
+}
+div.gallery-float img 
+{
+  border-style: none;
+}
+div.gallery-spacer 
+{
+  clear: both;
+}
+a
+{
+  text-decoration: none;
+}
+a:hover
+{
+  text-decoration: underline;
+  color: #FF0000;
+}

+</para>

+<para>
+
+</para>

+

+</para>

+ at b:

+matrix
+

+<para>

+<para>
+
+</para>

+<para>

+</para>

+ at matrix: 
+ at Returns: 
+

+<!-- ##### FUNCTION g3d_matrix_multiply ##### -->
+<para>
+
+</para>
+
+ at m1: 
+ at m2: 
+ at rm: 
+ at Returns: 
+

+<!-- ##### FUNCTION g3d_matrix_translate ##### -->
+<para>
+
+</para>
+
+ at x: 
+ at y: 
+ at z: 
+ at rm: 
+ at Returns: 
+
+
+<!-- ##### FUNCTION g3d_matrix_rotate ##### -->
+<para>
+
+</para>
+
+ at angle: 
+ at ax: 
+ at ay: 
+ at az: 
+ at rm: 
+ at Returns: 
+
+
+<!-- ##### FUNCTION g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz ##### -->
+<para>
+
+</para>
+
+ at rx: 
+ at ry: 
+ at rz: 
+ at rm: 
+ at Returns: 
+
+
