Added: trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/context.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/context.xml	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/context.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,179 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-context">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">context</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>context</refname>
+<refpurpose>Libg3d initialization and configuration</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link>* <link linkend="g3d-context-new">g3d_context_new</link>                 (void);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-context-free">g3d_context_free</link>                (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-context-set-bgcolor">g3d_context_set_bgcolor</link>         (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> g,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> b,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> a);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-context-update-interface">g3d_context_update_interface</link>    (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-context-update-progress-bar">g3d_context_update_progress_bar</link> (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> percentage,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> visibility);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-context-set-set-bgcolor-func">g3d_context_set_set_bgcolor_func</link>
+                                            (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DSetBgColorFunc">G3DSetBgColorFunc</link> func,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-new" role="function"/>g3d_context_new ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_new</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link>* g3d_context_new                 (void);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Create a new context. This initializes the library (and also the
+plugin system so this has not to be done seperately).</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> a valid context, or NULL on failure.
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-free" role="function"/>g3d_context_free ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_free</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_context_free                (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Cleans up the context and the plugin system and frees all reserved
+memory.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the context to free
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-set-bgcolor" role="function"/>g3d_context_set_bgcolor ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_set_bgcolor</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_context_set_bgcolor         (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> g,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> b,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> a);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Try to set the background color. This will call a function registered
+with <link><parameter>g3d_context_set_set_bgcolor_func</parameter></link>.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>r</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> red component (range: 0.0 .. 1.0)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>g</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> green component (range: 0.0 .. 1.0)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>b</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> green component (range: 0.0 .. 1.0)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>a</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> alpha component
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-update-interface" role="function"/>g3d_context_update_interface ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_update_interface</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_context_update_interface    (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Try to update the interface. This will call a function registered with
+<parameter>g3d_context_set_update_interface_func</parameter>.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-update-progress-bar" role="function"/>g3d_context_update_progress_bar ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_update_progress_bar</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_context_update_progress_bar (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> percentage,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> visibility);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Try to update the progress bar.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>percentage</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the percentage to set on the progress bar
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>visibility</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> show or hide the progress bar
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-context-set-set-bgcolor-func" role="function"/>g3d_context_set_set_bgcolor_func ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_context_set_set_bgcolor_func</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_context_set_set_bgcolor_func
+                                            (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DSetBgColorFunc">G3DSetBgColorFunc</link> func,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Registers a callback function for setting the background color.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>func</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the callback function
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>user_data</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> user-defined opaque pointer
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/face.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,98 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-face">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">face</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>face</refname>
+<refpurpose>Face manipulation</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-face-get-normal">g3d_face_get_normal</link>             (<link linkend="G3DFace">G3DFace</link> *face,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *nx,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *ny,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *nz);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-face-free">g3d_face_free</link>                   (<link linkend="G3DFace">G3DFace</link> *face);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-face-get-normal" role="function"/>g3d_face_get_normal ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_face_get_normal</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_face_get_normal             (<link linkend="G3DFace">G3DFace</link> *face,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *nx,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *ny,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *nz);</programlisting>
+<para>
+calculates the normal of a face.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>face</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> face to calculate normal of
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> object containing vertices of face
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>nx</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> x component of resulting normal
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>ny</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> y component of resulting normal
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>nz</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> z component of resulting normal
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-face-free" role="function"/>g3d_face_free ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_face_free</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_face_free                   (<link linkend="G3DFace">G3DFace</link> *face);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Frees all memory allocated for this face.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>face</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the face to free
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>iff</refname>
+<refpurpose>IFF file helper functions</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-IFF-MKID:CAPS">G3D_IFF_MKID</link>                    (a,b,c,d)
+<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link>*       <link linkend="g3d-iff-open">g3d_iff_open</link>                    (const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *id,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *len);
+<link linkend="int">int</link>         <link linkend="g3d-iff-readchunk">g3d_iff_readchunk</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *id,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *len);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-IFF-MKID:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_IFF_MKID()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_IFF_MKID</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define     G3D_IFF_MKID(a,b,c,d)</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>a</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>b</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>c</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>d</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-iff-open" role="function"/>g3d_iff_open ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_iff_open</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link>*       g3d_iff_open                    (const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *id,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *len);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Opens an IFF file, checks it and reads its top level container.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>filename</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> file name of IFF file
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>id</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> top level ID (out)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>len</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> length of top level container (out)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> the file pointer of open file or NULL in case of an error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-iff-readchunk" role="function"/>g3d_iff_readchunk ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_iff_readchunk</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="int">int</link>         g3d_iff_readchunk               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *id,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> *len);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Reads one chunk header from an IFF file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the open IFF file pointer
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>id</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> ID of chunk (out)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>len</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> length of chunk (excluding header) (out)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> real length of chunk including header and possible padding byte
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

Added: trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/matrix.xml

--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/matrix.xml	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/matrix.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,185 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-matrix">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">matrix</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>matrix</refname>
+<refpurpose>Matrix manipulation and calculation</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-matrix-identity">g3d_matrix_identity</link>             (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *matrix);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-matrix-multiply">g3d_matrix_multiply</link>             (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *m1,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *m2,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-matrix-translate">g3d_matrix_translate</link>            (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> x,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> y,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> z,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-matrix-rotate">g3d_matrix_rotate</link>               (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> angle,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ax,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ay,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> az,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-matrix-rotate-xyz">g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz</link>           (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> rx,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ry,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> rz,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-matrix-identity" role="function"/>g3d_matrix_identity ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_matrix_identity</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_matrix_identity             (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *matrix);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Sets the given matrix to the identity matrix.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>matrix</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> 4x4 matrix (float[16])
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-matrix-multiply" role="function"/>g3d_matrix_multiply ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_matrix_multiply</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_matrix_multiply             (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *m1,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *m2,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Multiplies the matrixes.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>m1</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> first matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>m2</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> second matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rm</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> resulting matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-matrix-translate" role="function"/>g3d_matrix_translate ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_matrix_translate</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_matrix_translate            (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> x,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> y,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> z,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Adds a translation to the the matrix.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>x</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> x translation
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>y</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> y translation
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>z</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> z translation
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rm</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> resulting matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-matrix-rotate" role="function"/>g3d_matrix_rotate ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_matrix_rotate</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_matrix_rotate               (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> angle,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ax,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ay,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> az,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Adds a rotation to the matrix.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>angle</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> rotation angle
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>ax</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> x component of rotation axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>ay</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> y component of rotation axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>az</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> z component of rotation axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rm</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> resulting matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-matrix-rotate-xyz" role="function"/>g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_matrix_rotate_xyz           (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> rx,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> ry,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> rz,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *rm);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Adds a rotation around the 3 coordinate system axes to the matrix.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rx</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> rotation around x axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>ry</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> rotation around y axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rz</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> rotation around z axis
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>rm</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> resulting matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-model">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">model</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>model</refname>
+<refpurpose>Model manipulation functions</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link>*   <link linkend="g3d-model-new">g3d_model_new</link>                   (void);
+<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link>*   <link linkend="g3d-model-load">g3d_model_load</link>                  (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-model-check">g3d_model_check</link>                 (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-model-center">g3d_model_center</link>                (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-model-clear">g3d_model_clear</link>                 (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-model-free">g3d_model_free</link>                  (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-new" role="function"/>g3d_model_new ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_new</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link>*   g3d_model_new                   (void);</programlisting>
+<para>
+This functions allocates and initializes a new G3DModel.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> a newly allocated G3DModel
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-load" role="function"/>g3d_model_load ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_load</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link>*   g3d_model_load                  (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Loads a model from a file. The model is checked, centered, resized,
+optimized.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>filename</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file name of the model to load
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> the loaded model or NULL in case of an error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-check" role="function"/>g3d_model_check ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_check</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_model_check                 (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Checks whether a model returned by plugin is valid.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>model</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the model to check
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE on error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-center" role="function"/>g3d_model_center ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_center</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_model_center                (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Translates all object coordinates that the object center is at (0, 0, 0)</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>model</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the model to center
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE on error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-clear" role="function"/>g3d_model_clear ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_clear</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_model_clear                 (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Removes all objects from a model.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>model</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the model to clear
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-model-free" role="function"/>g3d_model_free ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_model_free</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_model_free                  (<link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Frees all memory allocated for the model including all objects, materials
+and textures.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>model</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the model to free
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-object">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">object</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>object</refname>
+<refpurpose>Object manipulation</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-object-free">g3d_object_free</link>                 (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);
+<link linkend="gdouble">gdouble</link>     <link linkend="g3d-object-radius">g3d_object_radius</link>               (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-object-scale">g3d_object_scale</link>                (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> scale);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-object-transform">g3d_object_transform</link>            (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *matrix);
+<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  <link linkend="g3d-object-duplicate">g3d_object_duplicate</link>            (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-object-optimize">g3d_object_optimize</link>             (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-object-smooth">g3d_object_smooth</link>               (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-object-merge">g3d_object_merge</link>                (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *o1,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *o2);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+

+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-free" role="function"/>g3d_object_free ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_free</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        g3d_object_free                 (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Frees all memory allocated for that object.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to free
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-radius" role="function"/>g3d_object_radius ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_radius</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gdouble">gdouble</link>     g3d_object_radius               (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Calculates the radius of the object. This is the maximum from the
+center to a vertex.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to measure
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> the radius of the given object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-scale" role="function"/>g3d_object_scale ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_scale</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_object_scale                (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> scale);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Resizes the object by the factor <parameter>scale</parameter>.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to scale
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>scale</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> scale factor
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-transform" role="function"/>g3d_object_transform ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_transform</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_object_transform            (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> *matrix);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Multiplies all vertices of the object with the transformation matrix.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to transform
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>matrix</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the transformation matrix
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-duplicate" role="function"/>g3d_object_duplicate ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_duplicate</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  g3d_object_duplicate            (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Duplicates an object with all vertices, faces and materials.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to duplicate
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> the new clone object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-optimize" role="function"/>g3d_object_optimize ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_optimize</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_object_optimize             (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Puts all vertex and face information into special arrays for faster
+rendering.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to optimize
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-smooth" role="function"/>g3d_object_smooth ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_smooth</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_object_smooth               (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *object);</programlisting>
+<para>
+FIXME: unimplemented.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>object</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the object to smooth
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-object-merge" role="function"/>g3d_object_merge ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_object_merge</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_object_merge                (<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *o1,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link> *o2);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Merges both objects into <parameter>o1</parameter>.
+FIXME: needs cleanup</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>o1</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> first and target object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>o2</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> second object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/plugins.xml	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/plugins.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,311 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-plugins">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">plugins</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>plugins</refname>
+<refpurpose>Plugin interface</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-PLUGIN-UNKNOWN:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN</link>
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-PLUGIN-IMPORT:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT</link>
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-PLUGIN-IMAGE:CAPS">G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE</link>
+<link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link>    (<link linkend="PluginInitFunc">*PluginInitFunc</link>)               (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        (<link linkend="PluginCleanupFunc">*PluginCleanupFunc</link>)            (<link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (<link linkend="PluginLoadModelFunc">*PluginLoadModelFunc</link>)          (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (<link linkend="PluginLoadImageFunc">*PluginLoadImageFunc</link>)          (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link> *image,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+<link linkend="gchar">gchar</link>*      (<link linkend="PluginGetDescFunc">*PluginGetDescFunc</link>)            (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="gchar">gchar</link>**     (<link linkend="PluginGetExtFunc">*PluginGetExtFunc</link>)             (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+            <link linkend="G3DPlugin">G3DPlugin</link>;
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-plugins-init">g3d_plugins_init</link>                (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="void">void</link>        <link linkend="g3d-plugins-cleanup">g3d_plugins_cleanup</link>             (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-plugins-load-model">g3d_plugins_load_model</link>          (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-plugins-load-image">g3d_plugins_load_image</link>          (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link> *image);
+<link linkend="gchar">gchar</link>**     <link linkend="g3d-plugins-get-image-extensions">g3d_plugins_get_image_extensions</link>
+                                            (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-PLUGIN-UNKNOWN:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_PLUGIN_UNKNOWN   0x00
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-PLUGIN-IMPORT:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_PLUGIN_IMPORT    0x01
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-PLUGIN-IMAGE:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_PLUGIN_IMAGE     0x02
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="PluginInitFunc" role="function"/>PluginInitFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>PluginInitFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link>    (*PluginInitFunc)               (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context);</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="PluginCleanupFunc" role="function"/>PluginCleanupFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>PluginCleanupFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="void">void</link>        (*PluginCleanupFunc)            (<link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>user_data</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="PluginLoadModelFunc" role="function"/>PluginLoadModelFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>PluginLoadModelFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (*PluginLoadModelFunc)          (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename,

+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DPlugin" role="struct"/>G3DPlugin</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DPlugin</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	gchar *path;
+	guint32 type;
+	gchar **extensions;
+
+	PluginInitFunc init_func;
+	PluginCleanupFunc cleanup_func;
+	PluginLoadModelFunc loadmodel_func;
+	PluginLoadImageFunc loadimage_func;
+	PluginGetDescFunc desc_func;
+	PluginGetExtFunc ext_func;
+
+	gpointer user_data;
+
+	GModule *module;
+} G3DPlugin;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>

--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/primitive.xml	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/primitive.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,135 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-primitive">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">primitive</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>primitive</refname>
+<refpurpose>3D primitive generation functions</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  <link linkend="g3d-primitive-cylinder">g3d_primitive_cylinder</link>          (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> radius,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> height,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> sides,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> top,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> bottom,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</link> *material);
+<link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  <link linkend="g3d-primitive-tube">g3d_primitive_tube</link>              (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r_in,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r_out,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> height,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> sides,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> top,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> bottom,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</link> *material);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-primitive-cylinder" role="function"/>g3d_primitive_cylinder ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_primitive_cylinder</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  g3d_primitive_cylinder          (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> radius,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> height,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> sides,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> top,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> bottom,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</link> *material);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Generates an object containing a cylinder.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>radius</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the radius of the cylinder
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>height</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the height of the side faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>sides</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> number of side faces (number of circle segments)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>top</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> add top faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>bottom</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> add bottom faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>material</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> material to use for faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> cylinder object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-primitive-tube" role="function"/>g3d_primitive_tube ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_primitive_tube</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>*  g3d_primitive_tube              (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r_in,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r_out,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> height,
+                                             <link linkend="guint32">guint32</link> sides,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> top,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> bottom,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</link> *material);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Generates an object containing a tube (a cylinder with a hole).</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>r_in</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> inner radius
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>r_out</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> outer radius
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>height</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the height of the side faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>sides</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> number of side faces (number of circle segments)
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>top</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> add top faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>bottom</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> add bottom faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>material</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> material to use for faces
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> tube object
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-read">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">read</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>read</refname>
+<refpurpose>Binary file reading helper functions</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-int8">g3d_read_int8</link>                   (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-int16-be">g3d_read_int16_be</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-int16-le">g3d_read_int16_le</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-int32-be">g3d_read_int32_be</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-int32-le">g3d_read_int32_le</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-float-be">g3d_read_float_be</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link>      <link linkend="g3d-read-float-le">g3d_read_float_le</link>               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-int8" role="function"/>g3d_read_int8 ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_int8</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      g3d_read_int8                   (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 1 byte signed integer from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-int16-be" role="function"/>g3d_read_int16_be ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_int16_be</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      g3d_read_int16_be               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 2 byte big-endian signed integer from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-int16-le" role="function"/>g3d_read_int16_le ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_int16_le</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      g3d_read_int16_le               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 2 byte little-endian signed integer from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-int32-be" role="function"/>g3d_read_int32_be ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_int32_be</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      g3d_read_int32_be               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 4 byte big-endian signed integer from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-int32-le" role="function"/>g3d_read_int32_le ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_int32_le</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gint32">gint32</link>      g3d_read_int32_le               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 4 byte little-endian signed integer from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-float-be" role="function"/>g3d_read_float_be ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_float_be</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link>      g3d_read_float_be               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 4 byte big-endian floating point number from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-read-float-le" role="function"/>g3d_read_float_le ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_read_float_le</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link>      g3d_read_float_le               (<link linkend="FILE:CAPS">FILE</link> *f);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Read a 4 byte little-endian floating point number from file.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>f</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file to read from
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> The read value, 0 in case of error
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

Added: trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/texture.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/texture.xml	2006-05-24 22:56:15 UTC (rev 292)
+++ trunk/libg3d/doc/api/xml/texture.xml	2006-05-25 12:31:14 UTC (rev 293)
@@ -0,0 +1,93 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-texture">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">texture</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>texture</refname>
+<refpurpose>Texture loading and manipulation</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+<link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link>*   <link linkend="g3d-texture-load-cached">g3d_texture_load_cached</link>         (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    <link linkend="g3d-texture-prepare">g3d_texture_prepare</link>             (<link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link> *texture);
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-texture-load-cached" role="function"/>g3d_texture_load_cached ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_texture_load_cached</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link>*   g3d_texture_load_cached         (<link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link> *context,
+                                             <link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link> *model,
+                                             const <link linkend="gchar">gchar</link> *filename);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Loads a texture image from file and attaches it to a hash table in the
+model. On a second try to load this texture it is returned from cache.</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>context</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid context
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>model</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a valid model
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>filename</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> the file name of the texture to load
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> the texture image
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="g3d-texture-prepare" role="function"/>g3d_texture_prepare ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>g3d_texture_prepare</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    g3d_texture_prepare             (<link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link> *texture);</programlisting>
+<para>
+Resizes the image to dimensions which are a power of 2 to be
+usable as an OpenGL texture.
+(FIXME: unimplemented)</para>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>texture</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara> a texture image
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara> TRUE on success, FALSE else
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+
+</refsect1>
+
+
+
+
+</refentry>

+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<!DOCTYPE refentry PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML V4.1.2//EN" 
+               "http://www.oasis-open.org/docbook/xml/4.1.2/docbookx.dtd">
+<refentry id="libg3d-types">
+<refmeta>
+<refentrytitle id="top_of_page">types</refentrytitle>
+<manvolnum>3</manvolnum>
+<refmiscinfo>LIBG3D Library</refmiscinfo>
+</refmeta>
+
+<refnamediv>
+<refname>types</refname>
+<refpurpose>All types used in libg3d</refpurpose>
+<!--[<xref linkend="desc" endterm="desc.title"/>]-->
+</refnamediv>
+
+<refsynopsisdiv id="synopsis">
+<title id="synopsis.title">Synopsis</title>
+
+<synopsis>
+
+
+
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-FLAG-IMG-GREYSCALE:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE</link>
+            <link linkend="G3DImage">G3DImage</link>;
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-FLAG-MAT-TWOSIDE:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE</link>
+            <link linkend="G3DMaterial">G3DMaterial</link>;
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-FLAG-FAC-NORMALS:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS</link>
+#define     <link linkend="G3D-FLAG-FAC-TEXMAP:CAPS">G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP</link>
+            <link linkend="G3DFace">G3DFace</link>;
+            <link linkend="G3DObject">G3DObject</link>;
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (<link linkend="G3DSetBgColorFunc">*G3DSetBgColorFunc</link>)            (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> g,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> b,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> a,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (<link linkend="G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc">*G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc</link>)       (<link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+<link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (<link linkend="G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc">*G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc</link>)     (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> percentage,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> show,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);
+            <link linkend="G3DContext">G3DContext</link>;
+            <link linkend="G3DModel">G3DModel</link>;
+</synopsis>
+</refsynopsisdiv>
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+<refsect1 id="desc">
+<title id="desc.title">Description</title>
+<para>
+
+</para>
+</refsect1>
+
+<refsect1 id="details">
+<title id="details.title">Details</title>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-FLAG-IMG-GREYSCALE:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_FLAG_IMG_GREYSCALE  (1L << 1)
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DImage" role="struct"/>G3DImage</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DImage</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	guint32 width;
+	guint32 height;
+	guint8 depth;
+	guint32 flags;
+	guint8 *pixeldata;
+
+	guint32 tex_id;
+	gfloat tex_scale_u;
+	gfloat tex_scale_v;
+} G3DImage;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-FLAG-MAT-TWOSIDE:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_FLAG_MAT_TWOSIDE    (1L << 0)
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DMaterial" role="struct"/>G3DMaterial</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DMaterial</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+	gfloat r, g, b, a;
+	gfloat shininess;
+	gfloat specular[4];
+	guint32 flags;
+
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+} G3DMaterial;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-FLAG-FAC-NORMALS:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_FLAG_FAC_NORMALS    (1L << 0)
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3D-FLAG-FAC-TEXMAP:CAPS" role="macro"/>G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP</primary></indexterm><programlisting>#define G3D_FLAG_FAC_TEXMAP     (1L << 1)
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DFace" role="struct"/>G3DFace</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DFace</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	guint32 vertex_count;
+	guint32 *vertex_indices;
+
+	G3DMaterial *material;
+
+	guint32 flags;
+
+	gfloat *normals;
+
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+	guint32 tex_vertex_count;
+	gfloat *tex_vertex_data;
+} G3DFace;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DObject" role="struct"/>G3DObject</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DObject</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	gchar *name;
+
+	GSList *materials;
+	GSList *faces;
+	GSList *objects;
+
+	/* don't render this object */
+	gboolean hide;
+
+	/* vertices */
+	guint32 vertex_count;
+	gfloat *vertex_data;
+
+	/* texture stuff: temporary storage, should be in G3DFace items */
+	guint32 tex_vertex_count;
+	gfloat *tex_vertex_data;
+	G3DImage *tex_image;
+
+	/* some fields to speed up rendering, should not be used by plugins */
+	/* FIXME: remove from API (replace with user_data pointer?) */
+	gfloat *_normals;
+	G3DMaterial **_materials;
+	guint32  _num_faces;
+	guint32 *_indices;
+	guint32 *_flags;
+	guint32 *_tex_images;
+	gfloat *_tex_coords;
+} G3DObject;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DSetBgColorFunc" role="function"/>G3DSetBgColorFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DSetBgColorFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (*G3DSetBgColorFunc)            (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> r,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> g,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> b,
+                                             <link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> a,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>r</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>g</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>b</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>a</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>user_data</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc" role="function"/>G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (*G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc)       (<link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>user_data</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc" role="function"/>G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc ()</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc</primary></indexterm><programlisting><link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link>    (*G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc)     (<link linkend="gfloat">gfloat</link> percentage,
+                                             <link linkend="gboolean">gboolean</link> show,
+                                             <link linkend="gpointer">gpointer</link> user_data);</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para><variablelist role="params">
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>percentage</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>show</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><parameter>user_data</parameter> :</term>
+<listitem><simpara>
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+<varlistentry><term><emphasis>Returns</emphasis> :</term><listitem><simpara>
+
+
+</simpara></listitem></varlistentry>
+</variablelist></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DContext" role="struct"/>G3DContext</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DContext</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	GSList *plugins;
+
+	GHashTable *exts_import;
+	GHashTable *exts_image;
+
+	G3DSetBgColorFunc set_bgcolor_func;
+	gpointer set_bgcolor_data;
+	G3DUpdateInterfaceFunc update_interface_func;
+	gpointer update_interface_data;
+	G3DUpdateProgressBarFunc update_progress_bar_func;
+	gpointer update_progress_bar_data;
+} G3DContext;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>
+<refsect2>
+<title><anchor id="G3DModel" role="struct"/>G3DModel</title>
+<indexterm><primary>G3DModel</primary></indexterm><programlisting>typedef struct {
+	gchar *filename;
+	G3DContext *context;
+
+	GSList *materials;
+	GSList *objects;
+
+	GHashTable *tex_images;
+} G3DModel;
+</programlisting>
+<para>
+
+</para></refsect2>

+</refsect1>
